Title: Desconstruction
Description:
The Kirin Tor constructs are primitive at best. Nevertheless, they pose a threat.

Go to Violet Rise and dismantle Jaina's pitiful war machines. Show the Kirin Tor how easily they can be defeated!

This will be a message the Kirin Tor cannot easily ignore.
ObjectivesText: Destroy 3 Kirin Tor Constructs around Violet Rise.
